verbose_text: In this study we demonstrate that culturing cells in the presence of ascorbic acid and 10 mM beta-glycerophosphate (betaGP) significantly increases the rate of extracellular matrix (ECM) synthesis and reduces the time required for mineral deposition to occur to 15 days of culture.
evidence: beta-glycerophosphate (betaGP) significantly increases the rate of extracellular matrix (ECM
